name: Boneos
tagline: BoneOS Kernel and Operating System Source Tree
body: # Currently in Learning Proccess [Here](https://github.com/amanuel2/OS_MIRROR) . BoneOS Will Be Started as soon as i start to get more proficient in osdev # BoneOS BoneOS Kernel and Operating System Source Tree ##Getting OS There is an ISO File Available For you on the current directory. ##Building From Source Required Dependencies git grub qemu | virtualbox make | nmake ATLEAST v.2.7 Python Compiler Nasm Compiler ## Compiling OS For Building From Source See docs/installation/{Desired OS} Folder For More Info
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
